repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Ledbury Tradesmen and Trades Union Documents
did.abstract: Broadsides and meeting notes of tradesmen councils of Ledbury, England. 6 pieces.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of broadsides and meeting notes of tradesmen councils of Ledbury, England, dating from 1831 to 1834.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ledbury Tradesmen and Trades Union Documents #5899. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
